snippet: A pipe set aside at Keen’s English Chop House’s Pipe Club as a gift in 1976 is claimed — and smoked — decades later.
abstract: Keen's English Chop House's Pipe Club in Midtown Manhattan has been providing post-dinner smoking pipes to visitors, including Babe Ruth and Theodore Roosevelt, since the restaurant opened in 1885; pipes are assigned to visitors and kept on the premises.
lead_paragraph: A pipe set aside at Keen’s English Chop House’s Pipe Club as a gift in 1976 is claimed — and smoked — decades later.

headline.seo: Pipe From Keens Steakhouse Is Claimed, and Smoked, Decades After Storage
headline.main: A Pipe Dream Comes to Life
headline.print_headline: A Pipe Dream Comes to Life
